fields.name: Action
fields.description: Allow or Deny rules to determine for incoming IP. Note: Rules can only consist of ALL Allow or ALL Deny

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Describe the IP restriction rule that is being sent to the container-app. This is an optional field.

fields.name: IPAddressRange
fields.description: CIDR notation to match incoming IP address

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name for the IP restriction rule.
